description: Possessing a weak constitution, the bespectacled Marie has spent a lot of time in the hospital due to her illness. Her pet Michael, a Golden Retriever, acts as her guardian and friend when her brother isn`t around. She addresses her brother as Aniue-sama (兄上様?), the honorific -uesama (a combination of ue and -sama) being used within the royal family or as a sign of politeness. Her birthday is April 4, is an Aries and stands 148 cm (about 4` 10") tall.
name: Marie
